law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this title, on or after January 1, 2007, an individual shall be regi...

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this title, on or after January 1, 2007, an individual shall be registered and approved by the Board as a pharmacy technician before the individual may perform delegated pharmacy acts.

This section does not apply to:
A pharmacy student performing delegated pharmacy acts under the direct supervision of a licensed pharmacist and in accordance with regulations adopted by the Board;
A pharmacy technician trainee under the direct supervision of a licensed pharmacist provided that the individual does not perform delegated pharmacy acts for more than 6 months; or
An applicant for a license to practice pharmacy under the direct supervision of a licensed pharmacist provided that the applicant does not perform delegated pharmacy acts for more than 10 months.
